Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "We're here. The Maria is anchored at the abandoned dock.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "So... we're having a dinner party out in the wilds? Why not at the settlement?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'The Arctic is sparse in vegetation. If we light such a large bonfire at the settlement, that would give away our position.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "The small ones we usually light won't be visible more than three kilometers away, but bonfires used for banquets like this... Those can be seen fifty kilometers away.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "But, since we're doing it out here, more than half of the representatives from New Murmansk can come. Such a large banquet is quite the rare occurrence for the ARU.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Diana, did you just say a bonfire? But...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Yep. The bonfire will be lit when it's almost nighttime. The firelight and smoke will be more beautiful out on the snowfield in the evening.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Even if it's such a special occasion, we don't want to waste precious fuel.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a figure exits out of the woods.'}
{3: 'Realizing his hair and felt hat are covered in snow, branches, and pine leaves, the boy lowers his head and shakes himself clean.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'I told you not to go running around all by yourself...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "I'm not! Granny Anna wanted me to go collect pine leaves to make tea!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "So you walked all the way here from the Maria? Aren't there at least two pine forests along the road?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Anyway, no more running around now that you're with us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Liv brings Evan to her side and wipes the snow and pine needles off his hair with her sleeves.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "...Let's go. If Evan can find his way here, we can't be far.", 4: '1'}
